scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field2] SIP/2.0 CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] User-Agent: SIPp From: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] To: "[field0]" <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 70

REGISTER sip:[field2] SIP/2.0 CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] User-Agent: SIPp [field1] From: <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] To: <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 70
